channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Hot Linked Image Cacher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Hot Linked Image Cacher

item.title: CVE-2022-1765|2024-08-03T00:16:59.872Z -- unknown -- hot%20linked%20image%20cacher
item.description: The Hot Linked Image Cacher WordPress plugin through 1.16 is vulnerable to CSRF. This can be used to store / cache images from external domains on the server, which could lead to legal risks (due to copyright violations or licensing rules).
